mapper.select: select s.id as id,s.created_at as createdAt,s.created_by as createdBy, s.updated_by as updatedBy,s.updated_at as updatedAt,s.status as status, s.course_type_id as courseTypeId,s.name as name,s.graphic_details as graphicDetails, s.img_url as imgUrl,s.video_url as videoUrl,s.price as price, ct.name as courseTypeName, u.user_name as userName,u.user_desc as userDesc,u.avatar as avatar from t_course s left join t_course_type ct on s.course_type_id = ct.id left join t_user u on s.created_by = u.id where s.is_delete = 0 and s.id = #{id}
select * from t_course where is_delete = 0 and course_type_id = #{courseTypeId}
